person.bio: Ahmed is a passionate Engineer who loves learning new stuff. I love what Threefold is doing to give the internet back to the people, enabling those who do not have internet access by providing them with free, easilyâ€”accessible internet
person.excerpt: Passionate Engineer who loves learning new stuff.
